page.title: 05The Mouth Of The Itchen.
page.content: The area we surveyed was Woolston,an old mixed residential area . There was a commercial area, of shops,private offices and a petrol station.We saw{shipyard industries}at Vosper Thorneycroft. There were public and other community services e.g. Post Office buildings, St.Mark's C.of E. Church and several carparks. There is {Woolston Sailing Club,}with boat storage,using inland waters of wide rivers.Our survey area contains sea and a third of the River Itchen. There is a Post Office along Obelisk Rd.,a Take-Away hot food shop,a General Store that sells sweets and fruit,also a Clothing Shop. There is a garage with servicing.We saw Thorneycroft's Workingmens' Club, their Sports Club,a Water Sport Centre,a Betting Shop and two pubs-the Obelisk and the Victoria. There is a{Sewage Works}in Woolston.
